meanings: suggestion, offer; (공식적인) proposal; (특히 사업·정치 등의) proposition, suggest, (formal) propose, make a suggestion[proposal, proposition]; (회의 등에서) move

examples.korean: We all weighed in with our suggestions. 발음듣기 우리는 모두 제안을 하며 거들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We all weighed in with our suggestions. 발음

examples.korean: She is emphatically opposed to the proposals. 발음듣기 그녀는 그 제안들에 강력히 반대한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She is emphatically opposed to the proposals. 발음

examples.korean: They were browbeaten into accepting the offer. 발음듣기 그들은 협박을 받고 그 제안을 받아 들였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were browbeaten into accepting the offer. 발음

examples.korean: He shrugged aside suggestions that he resign. 발음듣기 그는 자기더러 사직하라는 제안을 하찮게 여겼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He shrugged aside suggestions that he resign. 발음

examples.korean: His proposal was outvoted by 10 votes to 8. 발음듣기 그의 제안은 10표 대 8표로 부결되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His proposal was outvoted by 10 votes to 8. 발음
